name: Roberto Battiti
content: Roberto Battiti Roberto Battiti Full Professor of Computer Science University of Trento, Italy LION (machine Learning and Intelligent OptimizatioN) Email: battiti ((AT)) alumni.caltech.edu List of publications Short bio I was born in Trento (Italy) and received the Laurea in Theoretical Physics from the University of Trento in 1985. Then I moved to the USA, where I received the Ph. D. degree in Computer Science and Neural Networks from the California Institute of Technology (Caltech) in 1990. I organize research initiatives in the area of machine learning and intelligent optimization (LION) and reactive search optimization (RSO) heuristics. My passion is to use data to build flexible models and extract actionable knowledge (machine learning), exploit knowledge to automate the discovery of improving solutions (intelligent optimization), connect insight to decisions and actions. I am leading the LION: machine Learning and Intelligent OptimizatioN initiative, author of THE LION WAY, Machine Learning plus Intelligent Optimization . I am a Fellow of the IEEE (class of 2009). I am the 2023 winner of INFORMS (The Institute for Operations Research and the Management Sciences) Test of Time Paper Award Combining Machine Learning and Optimization LION (machine learning and intelligent optimization) .
